scripts.build-debug: npm run cargo-build && (test -d debug || mkdir debug) && cp ../../../target/debug/rust_utils.dll debug/index.node
scripts.build-arm: npm run cargo-build -- --release --target aarch64-pc-windows-msvc && mkdir -p dist/windows-arm64 && cp ${CARGO_TARGET_DIR:-../../../target}/aarch64-pc-windows-msvc/release/rust_utils.dll dist/windows-arm64/index.node
scripts.build-x86: npm run cargo-build -- --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && mkdir -p dist/windows-x64 && cp ${CARGO_TARGET_DIR:-../../../target}/x86_64-pc-windows-msvc/release/rust_utils.dll dist/windows-x64/index.node
